author: charlie_mack
content:
gm!

I've decided to come and join you guys at devconn! I'm super exicited to meet you all :). As a permissionless participant I don't have privilege of a free ticket unfortunately. Therefore I thought I would shamelessly reach out to see if anyone is not using their plus one ticket and wouldn't mind sharing it with me. I'll certainly be happy to buy you a few drinks as a small token of my gratitude.
